data.message: I am a Dancing sign spinner in panamacity beach.  I listen too your words  an music from your begging.  I Grew up in  Grand Rapids Michigan.  So I understand  life living hard an making the best out of life.  I stand bye my little  kids.  I work everyday.  People love me Breakdancing old school  out here for the past 4years.  I love my life an your a Big inspiration.  In my life with Dre an everyone.  Awesome move.  50cent he has his moments.  I'm proud of you for putting  it Down for us in the world.  I Don't want anything for you you have Done more than enough  I just want too thank you. If this was the real slim shady.
